Literature.Title: Properties and structure-activity studies of cyclic beta-hairpin peptidomimetics based on the cationic antimicrobial peptide protegrin I.
Literature.Author: Robinson JA, Shankaramma SC, Jetter P, Kienzl U, Schwendener RA, Vrijbloed JW, Obrecht D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6.2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=6.2µg/ml)
